body_html:
I have installed tensorflow as per the instructions provided. Then I installed CUDA 9.0. But still shows error while importing tensorflow.

For this particular line:
"In particular, the cuDNN version must match exactly: TensorFlow will not load if it cannot find cuDNN64_7.dll."
I am trying to join https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn to download cudnn...but here i am unable to join as it shows me the error "Token expired"
body_text:
I have installed tensorflow as per the instructions provided. Then I installed CUDA 9.0. But still shows error while importing tensorflow.
For this particular line:
"In particular, the cuDNN version must match exactly: TensorFlow will not load if it cannot find cuDNN64_7.dll."
I am trying to join https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn to download cudnn...but here i am unable to join as it shows me the error "Token expired"
body:
I have installed tensorflow as per the instructions provided. Then I installed CUDA 9.0. But still shows error while importing tensorflow.

For this particular line:
"In particular, the cuDNN version must match exactly: TensorFlow will not load if it cannot find cuDNN64_7.dll."
I am trying to join https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn to download cudnn...but here i am unable to join as it shows me the error "Token expired"
